name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi links opener for search engines

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Multi links opener for search engines
short.zh_CN: 在新窗口打开百度/谷歌每条搜索结果

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open every link of search engine`s results,in new tabs.Support Google™,Baidu.Click once,and open every link.Avoid clicking one by one,and saved your time.
long.zh_CN: 在新窗口打开百度/谷歌每条搜索结果。免去逐条点击，手累
